entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:05 AM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
